snippet: Giorgio Chinaglia, who died Sunday at age 65, was a goal scorer, and fans cheered him not only in East Rutherford, N.J., where the Cosmos played, but wherever the brash, domineering team roamed.
abstract: An Appraisal; soccer great Giorgio Chinaglia, who died on April 1 at age 65, was a goal scorer, and fans cheered him not only in East Rutherford, NJ, where the New York Cosmos once played, but wherever the brash, domineering team roamed.
lead_paragraph: Giorgio Chinaglia, who died Sunday at age 65, was a goal scorer, and fans cheered him not only in East Rutherford, N.J., where the Cosmos played, but wherever the brash, domineering team roamed.

headline.main: The Straw That Stirred the Cosmos
headline.print_headline: The Straw That Stirred the Cosmos
